info.short_description: soc.ialis.me is a generalist and leftist instance runt by a collective
info.full_description:
Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

* Don't be a dick,
* No advertising, harassment, spam,
* No abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),
* Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin. We are 8 forming a administration council ;  @b9AcE @href @jd @wxl @marxistvegan @stephanmaus @Famine @hecate.

Don't hesitate to ping either one of the list or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at ialisme/soc.ialis.me on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.
